about_the_game:
Huanu Poems is a multi-ending love adventure game inspired by the ancient Chinese nickname for cats - Hua Nu. As a photographer, carrying the secret of being a bloodline inheritor of Hua Nu Town, you will take lovely Peach to run a B&B, encounter gentle Cloudia, and spend a warm and healing time with them. You will need to use a camera to capture the beautiful moments of the catgirls and respond to their strange questions and unexpected situations at any time. Your choice will determine which catgirl you will eventually become the master of, and unlock the hidden plot leading to the Photo Studio - meeting the two other catgirls: the arrogant Zhizhi and the innocent Meimei...

· Meet the four catgirls

*Peach Equivalent to 18 years of human age. Chinese rural Dragon Li cat. She is lively, cute, honest, and loyal. One bite of cat food and she will stay with you for the rest of her life.

*Cloudia Equivalent to 19 years of human age. Ragdoll cat, gentle and clingy, its beauty is a virtue least worth mentioning.

*Zhizhi Equivalent to 19 years of human age. Chinchilla cat, it’s not easy to please this gorgeous and aloof little princess.

*Meimei Equivalent to 18 years of human age. American Shorthair Munchkin cat, lively, cute, brave, aggressive, fun-loving even if she’s not good at it.

·Multi-branch interactions that need quick responses

Respond to their strange problems and emergency situations at lightning speed, cats don’t have that much patience!

·A plot with multiple endings that does not rely on likability

There’s no likability in life, your choices are like sliding doors, each step leading towards different destinies!

·Press the shutter at the right time

Use an old fixed-lens camera to take photos at the right time. If the photo is blurry, you will be laughed at!

· ONE MORE THING: Photo Studio

Experience taking photos in a professional photo studio. Only those who become her owner will have the opportunity to take photos for her!

*Clear Peach’s storyline, Cloudia’s storyline, and/or Duo storyline to unlock the opportunity to take photos of the corresponding catgirl.

*If you clear all three storylines above, you will unlock the opportunity to take photos for all four catgirls.

*In addition to the basic outfits, there are four more outfits that need to be unlocked in the hidden ending.

highlighted.name: The happiness of having two girls

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains sensitive contents such as partial nudity or sexual content, as well as alcohol use, may not be suitable for all age ranges.

name: 花奴令 HUANU POEMS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5或 AMD equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 32 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: Huanu Poems is a multi-ending love adventure game. As a photographer, carrying the secret of being a bloodline inheritor of HuaNu Town, you will take lovely Peach to run a B&B, encounter gentle Cloudia. Your choices will affect the direction of the story.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
